entry.title: Introducing Trnscofi
entry.content:
Introducing Trnscofi

14 Aug 2019

Trnscofi ( http://blog.trnscofi.in/ ) has been bootstrapped is on slicehost! I choose slicehost since it offered the most afforadable and flexible GNU/Linux server. For $20 (about 900 INR appx) a month, I get to have a debian lenny server where I can try out all my web experiments. Not a bad deal at all, my monthly mobile bill also adds up to a similar amount! Utility computing at its best, I’d say!
